text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Two days have passed since the<n>tryout races.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tomorrow, I'll have to prove myself<n>to Symboli Rudolf. I'm
walking around,<n>racking my brain for ideas, and then...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh. Hello again, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Wait! You're the trainer who was<n>speaking to Rudolf in the
cafeteria the<n>other day, right?

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Haha! When a trainer has a meal with<n>someone of Rudolf's
caliber right after<n>the tryouts, word's bound to get out!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heh... I guess we attracted more<n>attention than either of us
could have<n>expected.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
You and Rudolf seem close... Would<n>you mind if I asked a
favor of you?

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Could you stay by Rudolf's side<n>today and take some
candid shots of<n>her?
choice_data_list: You want me to take photos?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My apologies for dragging you into<n>this. They want to do an
"up close and<n>personal" feature with me, you see.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The only problem is, when I'm<n>surrounded by professional
reporters,<n>I end up acting professional myself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I was at my wit's end, wondering<n>what to do—and that's
when you<n>happened to arrive.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure Rudolf will be able to relax if<n>she's around you!
Please help us out!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Wait, you mean it? You... really do go<n>the extra mile.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: In that case, I look forward to our day<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so I take the camera from the<n>reporter and prepare to
spend the day<n>taking candid snaps of Symboli<n>Rudolf.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now then. According to the journalist,<n>I should ignore the
camera and go<n>about my daily routine.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
There's a new student I'm<n>concerned about. I have an idea
to<n>help her better adjust to life here.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Shall we?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah. I've been looking for you,<n>Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, hello, Rudolf! And hello to you<n>too, trainer.♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So, what brings you here? Anything I<n>can help you with?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, actually. I was hoping you could<n>help me with a
first-year named Grass<n>Wonder.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder! Yes, I know her.<n>She's an absolute
sweetie—and so<n>polite! What about her?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It might be because she's not<n>accustomed to the
academy's track<n>yet, but she's having a bit of trouble<n>
with her technique coming out of the<n>gate.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Is that so? Well, it does take awhile to adjust, especially whenyou're in a brand-new environment.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I don't want her to fall before she's<n>even had a chance to
fly. Could you<n>perhaps give her some words of<n>wisdom?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I can give her some pointers,<n>but... why me, if you
don't mind me<n>asking?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder... The explosive burst<n>of energy she puts
forth when she<n>runs reminds me somewhat of you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That's why I figured you'd be in the<n>best position to help
her.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
That makes sense. You really do look<n>out for all of us, don't
you?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I'm totally down, leave it to me! Do<n>you know where Grass
is?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I always appreciate the enthusiasm,<n>Maruzensky. I can take
you to her<n>now, if you like.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Symboli Rudolf leads the way to<n>Grass Wonder.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no. She looks so down in the<n>dumps. But I'm on it! I'll
turn her<n>frown upside down!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I knew I could count on you. I leave<n>this matter in your
capable hands,<n>Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Having me there would make Grass<n>Wonder nervous.
That's the last thing<n>I want for her.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Personally, I think she'd be happy to<n>know you're looking
out for her.<n>Hehe, but I like this awkward side of<n>you too.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I'm off.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That's that, then. I hope speaking<n>with Maruzensky can
alleviate Grass<n>Wonder's worries.
choice_data_list: You really know the student body.
You really know the student body.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well, for Grass Wonder... I know she<n>lived in the US for a
while. She has a<n>gentle outward demeanor that belies<n>an
adamant will within.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
She runs as a late surger, using<n>cool-headed observation
skills to<n>keenly assess the field and seize<n>victory with
precision. I expect she'll<n>go on to do great things

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And it's not just her. Every student<n>here enters the
academy with their<n>own dreams and hopes. Every one of<n>
them has the potential to make them<n>come true.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I... wish to make them all happy. I<n>can't help but feel it's my
duty to<n>create a world where all of them can<n>wear smiles.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Does this sound like the foolish<n>dream of a sheltered girl?
Perhaps<n>that's just what it is.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It goes without saying the road to<n>achieving my goal is long,
with no end<n>in sight, but...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Maruzensky. I... havebeen putting myself under a lot ofpressure, haven't I?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
That's right. You're quite serious,<n>and you always give
everything one<n>hundo p!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But trying to please everyone all the<n>time will wear you
down. Why don't<n>we chillax and go for a drive<n>sometime?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That sounds wonderful! Hehe... It<n>would be my honor! ♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Look at her smile.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I hope its warmth never fades... Of<n>that, at least, I have no
doubt.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Something about Symboli Rudolf's<n>own warm smile tugs at
my heart. It's<n>such a peaceful, contented<n>expression.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Almost without thinking, I raise the<n>camera, and...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Click.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What a beautiful shot. As the shutter<n>clicks, I also feel
something click into<n>place within me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I think I finally have the answer to<n>Symboli Rudolf's
question.
